text: "Hood Go Crazy" is a song by American rapper Tech N9ne, taken from his fifteenth studio album Special Effects (2015). The song was released on February 26, 2015 as the album's lead single. It was produced by N4. The song's chorus is rapped by B.o.B and features a guest verse from fellow American rapper 2 Chainz.http://www.hotnewhiphop.com/tech-n9ne-hood-go-crazy- feat-2-chainz-bob-new-song.1963202.html The song was certified Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) on June 17, 2020, for selling over one million units in the United States. ==Music video== The music video debuted on MTV April 26, 2015.http://www.mtv.com/videos/tech-n9ne/1194223/hood-go-crazy-feat-2-chainz- bob.jhtml ==Commercial performance== The song is Tech's highest charting single as a lead artist, peaking at 90 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- !scope="col"| Chart (2015) !scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row" |- !scope="row" |- !scope="row" |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- !scope="col"| Chart (2015) !scope="col"| position |- ! scope="row"| US Rhythmic (Billboard) | 36 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2015 singles Category:2015 songs Category:Tech N9ne songs Category:2 Chainz songs Category:B.o.B songs Category:Songs written by 2 Chainz Category:Songs written by B.o.B
title: Hood Go Crazy
